function loadPeopleData() {
  try {
    console.log('Loading embedded people data...');
    
    const data = embeddedPeopleData;
    
    if (!data.people || !Array.isArray(data.people)) {
      throw new Error('Invalid data structure');
    }
    
    data.people.forEach(person => {
      if (person.id) {
        peopleData[person.id] = person;
      }
    });
    
    console.log(`Loaded ${data.people.length} team members`);
    generatePeopleCards(data.people);
    hideLoading();
    
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error loading people data:', error);
    showError(`Failed to load team member information: ${error.message}`);
    hideLoading();
  }
}

function generatePeopleCards(people) {
  const gridContainer = document.getElementById('peopleGrid');
  gridContainer.innerHTML = '';
  
  people.forEach(person => {
    const cardDiv = document.createElement('div');
    cardDiv.className = 'person-card';
    
    const personCard = `
      <div class="person-image-container">
        <img 
        src="${person.image && person.image.trim() !== '' 
                ? person.image 
                : 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x280/667eea/ffffff?text=' + encodeURIComponent(person.name.split(' ')[0])}" 
        alt="${person.name}" 
        class="person-image"
        onerror="this.onerror=null; this.src='https://via.placeholder.com/400x280/667eea/ffffff?text=' + encodeURIComponent('${person.name.split(' ')[0]}')">
      </div>
      
      <div class="person-content">
        <div class="person-info">
          <h3 class="person-name">${person.name}</h3>
          <p class="person-title">${person.title || ''}</p>
          <a href="mailto:${person.email}" class="person-email">${person.email}</a>
        </div>
        
        <div class="card-actions">
          <button type="button" class="info-btn" onclick="openPersonModal('${person.id}')" aria-label="View ${person.name}'s profile">
            <i class="fas fa-user"></i>
          </button>
          
          ${person.googleScholar ? 
            `<a href="${person.googleScholar}" target="_blank" class="scholar-btn" aria-label="${person.name}'s Google Scholar">
              <i class="fas fa-graduation-cap"></i>
              Scholar
            </a>` : 
            `<span class="scholar-btn disabled">
              <i class="fas fa-graduation-cap"></i>
              Scholar
            </span>`
          }
        </div>
      </div>
    `;
    
    cardDiv.innerHTML = personCard;
    gridContainer.appendChild(cardDiv);
  });
  
  document.getElementById('peopleGrid').style.display = 'grid';
}

function openPersonModal(personId) {
  const person = peopleData[personId];
  if (!person) {
    console.error('Person not found:', personId);
    return;
  }
  
  document.getElementById('modalTitle').textContent = person.name;
  
  let content = `
    <div style="text-align: center; margin-bottom: 2rem;">
     <img 
      src="${person.image && person.image.trim() !== '' 
              ? person.image 
              : 'https://via.placeholder.com/150x150/667eea/ffffff?text=' + encodeURIComponent(person.name.split(' ')[0])}" 
      alt="${person.name}" 
      style="width: 150px; height: 150px; border-radius: 50%; object-fit: cover; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; border: 4px solid #0077cc; box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 119, 204, 0.3);" 
      onerror="this.onerror=null; this.src='https://via.placeholder.com/150x150/667eea/ffffff?text=' + encodeURIComponent('${person.name.split(' ')[0]}')">

      <h4 style="margin: 0; color: #0077cc; font-weight: 700; font-size: 1.5rem;">${person.name}</h4>
      <p style="margin: 0.5rem 0 1rem; color: #666; font-style: italic; font-size: 1.1rem;">${person.title || ''}</p>
      <div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 1rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;">
        <a href="mailto:${person.email}" style="color: #0077cc; text-decoration: none; background: rgba(0, 119, 204, 0.1); padding: 0.5rem 1rem; border-radius: 20px; font-size: 0.9rem;">
          <i class="fas fa-envelope"></i> ${person.email}
        </a>
        ${person.googleScholar ? `
          <a href="${person.googleScholar}" target="_blank" style="color: #4285f4; text-decoration: none; background: rgba(66, 133, 244, 0.1); padding: 0.5rem 1rem; border-radius: 20px; font-size: 0.9rem;">
            <i class="fas fa-graduation-cap"></i> Scholar
          </a>
        ` : ''}
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <div style="text-align: left;">
      <h5 style="color: #333; margin-bottom: 1rem; padding-bottom: 0.5rem; border-bottom: 3px solid #0077cc; font-size: 1.2rem;">Biography</h5>
      <p style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.7;">${person.bio || 'Biography coming soon...'}</p>
      
      ${person.education ? `
        <div style="margin-top: 1.5rem; padding: 1.5rem; background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(0, 119, 204, 0.05), rgba(0, 119, 204, 0.1)); border-radius: 15px; border-left: 5px solid #0077cc;">
          <strong style="color: #0077cc; font-size: 1.1rem;">
            <i class="fas fa-graduation-cap"></i> Education: 
          </strong>
          <span style="color: #333; font-size: 1rem;">${person.education}</span>
        </div>
      ` : ''}
    </div>
  `;
  
  document.getElementById('modalContent').innerHTML = content;
  
  const modal = document.getElementById('personModal');
  modal.classList.add('show');
  document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
}

function closeModal() {
  const modal = document.getElementById('personModal');
  modal.classList.remove('show');
  document.body.style.overflow = 'auto';
}

function hideLoading() {
  document.getElementById('loadingContainer').style.display = 'none';
}

function showError(message) {
  const errorContainer = document.getElementById('errorContainer');
  errorContainer.innerHTML = `<div class="error-message">${message}</div>`;
  errorContainer.style.display = 'block';
}

document.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
  if (event.target.id === 'personModal') {
    closeModal();
  }
});

document.addEventListener('keydown', function(event) {
  if (event.key === 'Escape') {
    closeModal();
  }
});

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  console.log('DOM loaded, initializing people page...');
  loadPeopleData();
});
</script>
